name: implosion
description: Add momentum to anything. It's like iScroll, except not for scrolling. Supports mouse and touch events.

scripts.build: babel src/implosion.js --modules umd -o dist/implosion.js && uglifyjs dist/implosion.js --comments -cmo dist/implosion.min.js
scripts.version: npm run build && git add dist docs -f
